member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine
member.summary: Provides high level form recognition and processing functionalities to recognize, process, and create forms. It uses the provided Master Form IMasterFormsRepository to recognize form type and process its fields.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.#ctor(Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngineCreateOptions)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of AutoFormsEngine with the specified options.
member.param: Options to use when creating the engine. Must not be **null**.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.#ctor(Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterFormsRepository,Leadtools.Ocr.IOcrEngine,Leadtools.Barcode.BarcodeEngine)
member.summary: Initializes a new AutoFormsEngine class object.
member.param: Repository of Master Forms.
The Leadtools.Ocr.IOcrEngine that is used for optical character recognition and processing.
The Leadtools.Barcode.BarcodeEngine that is used for barcode recognition and processing.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.#ctor(Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterFormsRepository,Leadtools.Ocr.IOcrEngine,Leadtools.Barcode.BarcodeEngine,Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsRecognitionManager)
member.summary: Initializes a new AutoFormsEngine class object.
member.param: Repository of Master Forms.
The Leadtools.Ocr.IOcrEngine that is used for optical character recognition and processing.
The Leadtools.Barcode.BarcodeEngine that is used for barcode recognition and processing.
The Object Managers to be used to recognize forms and generate Master Forms attributes in GenerateMasterFormAttributes.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.#ctor(Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterFormsRepository,Leadtools.Ocr.IOcrEngine,Leadtools.Barcode.BarcodeEngine,Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsRecognitionManager,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new AutoFormsEngine class object.
member.param: Repository of Master Forms.
The Leadtools.Ocr.IOcrEngine that is used for optical character recognition and processing.
The Leadtools.Barcode.BarcodeEngine that is used for barcode recognition and processing.
The Object Managers to be used to recognize forms and generate Master Forms attributes in GenerateMasterFormAttributes.
The minimum confidence value to decide that the Form type result is a known type. It ranges from 0 to 100 and usually it is less than \minimumConfidenceRecognized\.

The minimum confidence value to decide that the Form type is recognized and no further comparison with Master Forms is needed. It ranges from 0 to 100 and usually it is greater than \minimumConfidenceKnownForm\.
Recognize the form based on the first page only.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.#ctor(Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterFormsRepository,Leadtools.Ocr.IOcrEngine,Leadtools.Barcode.BarcodeEngine,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new AutoFormsEngine class object.
member.param: Repository of Master Forms.
The Leadtools.Ocr.IOcrEngine that is used for optical character recognition and processing.
The Leadtools.Barcode.BarcodeEngine that is used for barcode recognition and processing.
The minimum confidence value to decide that the Form type result is a known type. It ranges from 0 to 100 and usually it is less than \minimumConfidenceRecognized\.

The minimum confidence value to decide that the Form type is recognized and no further comparison with Master Forms is needed. It ranges from 0 to 100 and usually it is greater than \minimumConfidenceKnownForm\.
Recognize the form based on the first page only.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.CreateProcessingOcrEngine(Leadtools.Ocr.OcrEngineType,Leadtools.Codecs.RasterCodecs,Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriter,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create and startup OCR engine instance suitable for forms processing.
member.param: OCR engine type. Passed to OcrEngineManager.CreateEngine.
Raster codecs instance passed to IOcrEngine.Startup.
Document writer instance passed to IOcrEngine.Startup.
Work directory value passed to IOcrEngine.Startup.
Startup parameters value passed to IOcrEngine.Startup.
member.returns: An instance of IOcrEngine that started and setup with settings suitable for forms processing.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.CreateRecognitionOcrEngine(Leadtools.Ocr.OcrEngineType,Leadtools.Codecs.RasterCodecs,Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriter,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create and startup OCR engine instance suitable for forms recognition.
member.param: OCR engine type. Passed to OcrEngineManager.CreateEngine.
Raster codecs instance passed to IOcrEngine.Startup.
Document writer instance passed to IOcrEngine.Startup.
Work directory value passed to IOcrEngine.Startup.
Startup parameters value passed to IOcrEngine.Startup.
member.returns: An instance of IOcrEngine that started and setup with settings suitable for forms recognition.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.DeleteMasterFormsFromFullTextSearch
member.summary: Delete all the master forms in the repository from the full text search engine database.
member.returns: This method will loop through all the master forms in the IMasterFormsRepository set in this engine and delete each

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.GenerateMasterFormAttributes(Leadtools.RasterImage,System.String,Guid,Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.FormRecognitionOptions,Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.PageRecognitionOptions)
member.summary: Generate master Form attributes based on the Object Managers set when this AutoFormsEngine object is constructed.
member.param: Master form image, it must have all master form page images.
The Master Form name.
The Master Form ID.
Specifies the options for the Master Form.
List of Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.PageRecognitionOptions for all form pages.
member.returns: Returns the Master Forms attributes if the set Object Managers are able to extract its features, otherwise it returns null.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.GetMinimumRecognizedConfidenceForm
member.summary: Automatically finds the minimum confidence value that is needed to consider an unknown form as recognized and no further Master Form comparison is needed.
member.returns: The minimum confidence value that is needed to consider unknown form as recognized.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.GetMinimumRecognizedConfidencePage
member.summary: Automatically finds the minimum confidence value that is needed to consider an unknown page as recognized and no further Master Form Pages comparison is needed.
member.returns: The minimum confidence value that is needed to consider unknown page is recognized.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.ProcessForm(Leadtools.RasterImage,Leadtools.Forms.Auto.PageRequestCallback,System.Object,Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsRecognizeFormResult)
member.summary: Performs field processing on the recognized form image.
member.param: The recognized Form image.
Page request callback if more form images are needed.
The user defined data that is associated with PageRequestCallback.
The form recognition result that has been returned by RecognizeForm(RasterImage,List\<IMasterFormsCategory\>).
member.returns: The processed fields if the Master Form has fields, otherwise it returns null.

member.summary: Performs field processing on the recognized form image.
member.param: The recognized Form image.
Page request callback if more form images are needed.
The user defined data that is associated with PageRequestCallback.
The Master Form attributes of the form type.
The fields to be processed for the Master Form of the form type.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.RecognizeForm(Leadtools.RasterImage,Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterFormsCategory)
member.summary: Recognize the unknown form type.
member.param: Form image.
List of Master Forms categories to use in comparison, pass null or empty to use all Master Forms in the repository.
member.returns: The result of the recognition will be the result of the Master Form with maximum confidence. If the confidence is less than MinimumConfidenceKnownForm it will return null, i.e. the form type is unknown and cannot be recognized.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.RecognizeForm(System.IO.Stream,Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterFormsCategory)
member.summary: Recognize the unknown form type.
member.param: A System.IO.Stream containing the unknown form image data.

member.returns: The result of the recognition will be the result of the Master Form with maximum confidence. If the confidence is less than MinimumConfidenceKnownForm it will return null, i.e. the form type is unknown and cannot be recognized.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.Run(Leadtools.RasterImage,Leadtools.Forms.Auto.PageRequestCallback,System.Object,Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterFormsCategory)
member.summary: Automatically recognizes the unknown form then it processes its fields.
member.param: The unknown form image.
Page request callback if more form images are needed.
The user defined data that is associated with PageRequestCallback.
List of Master Forms categories to use in comparison, pass null or empty to use all Master Forms in the repository.
member.returns: Returns the results of the recognition and processing if the form is recognized, otherwise it returns null. If the Master Form has no processing field, AutoFormsRunResult.FormFields will be null.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.Run(System.IO.Stream,Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterFormsCategory)
member.summary: Automatically recognizes the unknown form then it processes its fields.
member.param: A System.IO.Stream containing the unknown form image data.
List of Master Forms categories to use in comparison, pass null or empty to use all Master Forms in the repository.
member.returns: Returns the results of the recognition and processing if the form is recognized, otherwise it returns null. If the Master Form has no processing field, AutoFormsRunResult.FormFields will be null.

member.summary: Automatically recognizes the unknown form then it processes its fields.

member.returns: Returns the results of the recognition and processing if the form is recognized, otherwise it returns null. If the Master Form has no processing field, AutoFormsRunResult.FormFields will be null.

member.returns: Returns the results of the recognition and processing if the form is recognized, otherwise it returns null. If the Master Form has no processing field, AutoFormsRunResult.FormFields will be null.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.SetFullTextSearchManager(Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.IFullTextSearchManager,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Begin full text search manager support.
member.param: Instance of a class that implements IFullTextSearchManager here to enable the use of full text search during the recognition process.
Repository name to use with all full text search. If this is **null**, then the default repository without a name will be searched.
Optional language of the form. Passing **null** will default to "en-US" (or locale ID 1033).

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.UpsertMasterFormsToFullTextSearch
member.summary: Add or updates all the master forms in the repository to the full text search engine database.
member.returns: This method will loop through all the master forms in the IMasterFormsRepository set in this engine and add or update each

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by this AutoFormsEngine.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases all the resources used by this AutoFormsEngine.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.Finalize
member.summary: This member overrides System.Object.Finalize.

member.name: E:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.Progress
member.summary: Optional delegate method used after page processing is finished.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.EnableQuickPreRecognitionCheck
member.summary: Indicates whether to use the quick-check process to identify the form. If it fails, it will perform the recognition process.
member.value: **true** to use the quick-check process to identify the form.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.FilledFormType
member.summary: Default value for PageRecognitionOptions.PageType.
member.value: The default value is FormsPageType.Normal.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.FIPSCompatibleMode
member.summary: Enables or disables Compatible with FIPS(Federal Information Processing Standards).
member.value: **true** to enable FIPS Compatibility mode, **false**, to disable Compatibility.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.FullTextSearchLanguage
member.summary: Full text search language.
member.value: The same full text search language value passed in the SetFullTextSearchManager method, or **null** if none was used.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.FullTextSearchManager
member.summary: Full text search manager used set in the engine.
member.value: The same full text search manager instance passed in the SetFullTextSearchManager method, or **null** if none was used.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.FullTextSearchMaximumCandidates
member.summary: The maximum number of matches (candidates) to return.
member.value: The default value is 3. Must be a number greater than or equal to 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.FullTextSearchMinimumRank
member.summary: Minimum rank value to be considered a match (or candidate).
member.value: The default value is -1 meaning to return all candidates.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.FullTextSearchRepositoryName
member.summary: Full text search repository name.
member.value: The same full text search repository name passed in the SetFullTextSearchManager method, or **null** if none was used.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.MasterFormCacheMaximumSize
member.summary: Specifies the maximum number of master forms that can be stored in a cache at any time.
member.value: Specifies the maximum number of master forms that can be stored in a cache at any time. Set to 1 or less to make the caches perform as load on demand.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.MasterFormLoadType
member.summary: Specifies how to load in memory the master form data found in the repository.
member.value: Gets the load type for master form data.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.MinimumConfidenceKnownForm
member.summary: The minimum confidence value to consider the form as being one of the known types in Master Forms repository.
member.value: The minimum confidence value to consider the form as being one of the known types in Master Forms repository.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.MinimumConfidenceRecognized
member.summary: The minimum confidence value to consider the form as being recognized and to stop searching Master Forms.
member.value: The minimum confidence value to consider the form as being recognized and to stop searching Master Forms.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.ProcessingOcrEngine
member.summary: Gets the OCR engine used for processing.
member.value: The OCR engine used for processing.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.RecognitionOcrEngine
member.summary: Gets the OCR engine used for recognition.
member.value: The OCR engine used for recognition.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.RecognizeFirstPageOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets the method of recognizing unknown forms.
member.value: True if the comparison is going to be done based on the first page of the form, otherwise false.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.TradeoffMode
member.summary: Specifies which recognition algorithm trade-off setting to use for forms recognition and processing.
member.value: The Leadtools.Forms.Common.FormsTradeoffMode setting to use for forms recognition and processing.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngine.UseThreadPool
member.summary: Enables or disables the use of a .NET ThreadPool when recognizing and processing forms.
member.value: **true** to enable the use of a .NET ThreadPool; otherwise, **false** (use Win32 threads).

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngineCreateOptions
member.summary: Options to use when creating a new AutoFormsEngine.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngineCreateOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of AutoFormsEngineCreateOptions.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngineCreateOptions.BarcodeEngine
member.summary: Engine for barcode recognition and processing.
member.value: The BarcodeEngine instance used for barcode recognition and processing. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngineCreateOptions.Managers
member.summary: Object Managers to be used to recognize forms and generate Master Forms attributes.
member.value: Default value is AutoFormsRecognitionManager.None.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngineCreateOptions.MasterFormLoadType
member.summary: Specifies how to load master form data found in the repository.
member.value: The load type for master form data

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngineCreateOptions.MinimumConfidenceKnownForm
member.summary: Minimum confidence value to decide that the Form type result is a known type.
member.value: Valid values are from 0 to 100 and usually it is less than MinimumConfidenceRecognized. Default value is 30.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngineCreateOptions.MinimumConfidenceRecognized
member.summary: Minimum confidence value to decide that the Form type is recognized and no further comparison with Master Forms is needed.
member.value: Valid values are from 0 to 100 and usually it is greater than MinimumConfidenceKnownForm. Default value is 90.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngineCreateOptions.ProcessingOcrEngine
member.summary: OCR engine used for field processing.
member.value: The OCR engine instance used for field processing. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngineCreateOptions.RecognitionOcrEngine
member.summary: OCR engine used for form recognition.
member.value: The OCR engine instance used for form recognition. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngineCreateOptions.RecognizeFirstPageOnly
member.summary: Recognize the form based on the first page only.
member.value: **true** to recognize the form based on the first page only, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEngineCreateOptions.Repository
member.summary: Repository of Master Forms.
member.value: The master forms repository. Default value is **null**.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEnginePageRecognitionOptions
member.summary: Options for recognizing the type an unknown page.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEnginePageRecognitionOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of this class.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEnginePageRecognitionOptions.Categories
member.summary: List of Master Forms categories to use in comparison.
member.value: Pass **null** or an empty list to use all Master Forms in the repository. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsEnginePageRecognitionOptions.ForProcessing
member.summary: Indicate that the engine must use the processing OCR engine if needed.
member.value: **true** to use processing OCR engine if needed, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **true**.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsProgressEventArgs
member.summary: Reports the progress for specific AutoFormsEngine operations and offers the user an opportunity to cancel.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the AutoFormsProgressEventArgs class.

A value between 0 and 100 that represents the percent completion of the process.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsProgressEventArgs.Cancel
member.summary: Cancel the current operation.
member.value: true cancel the current operation, otherwise, continue.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsProgressEventArgs.Operation
member.summary: Gets the current running AutoFormsOperation.
member.value: The current running AutoFormsOperation.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.AutoFormsProgressEventArgs.Percentage
member.summary: A value between 0 and 100 that represents the percent completion of the process.
member.value: A value between 0 and 100 that represents the percent completion of the process.

member.summary: Gets the form recognition result.

member.summary: Gets Leadtools.Forms.Common.PageAlignment object that determines the amount of shift and scaling of the page with its corresponding page in the Master Form.

member.value: Form recognition result. If it is null, the form type is unknown.

member.summary: Initializes a new AutoFormsRunResult class object.

member.summary: Gets the processed form fields.

member.summary: Gets Form recognition results.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.DiskMasterForm

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterForm
member.summary: Represents a Master Form inside a IMasterFormsCategory. It provides methods to read and write Master Form recognition attributes, processing fields, and images.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterForm.ReadAttributes
member.summary: Reads Master Form recognition attributes.
member.returns: Returns Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.FormRecognitionAttributes if recognition attributes are available; otherwise it returns null.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterForm.ReadFields
member.summary: Reads Master Form processing fields.
member.returns: Returns Leadtools.Forms.Processing.FormPages if the processing fields are available, otherwise it returns null.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterForm.ReadForm
member.summary: Reads a Master Form image.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterForm.WriteAttributes(Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.FormRecognitionAttributes)
member.summary: Writes Master Form Attributes.
member.param: Master Form attributes.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterForm.WriteFields(Leadtools.Forms.Processing.FormPages)
member.summary: Writes Master Form processing fields.
member.param: Master Form processing fields.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterForm.WriteForm(Leadtools.RasterImage)
member.summary: Writes the Master Form image.
member.param: The Master Form image.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterForm.CandidatePageNumber
member.summary: Page number of the candidate page found with full text search.
member.value: The 1-based page number of the candidate page found with full text search. Default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterForm.IsExtendable
member.summary: Returns If form is extendable (contains Leadtools.Forms.Processing.TableFormField (invoice)).
member.value: Is master Form extendable.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterForm.Name
member.summary: Returns the name of the Master Form.
member.value: The master Form name.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterForm.Parent
member.summary: Gets the parent of this IMasterForm.
member.value: Returns an IMasterFormsCategory that is the parent to this IMasterForm object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterForm.Repository
member.summary: Gets the IMasterFormsRepository to which this IMasterForm object belongs.
member.value: The IMasterFormsRepository to which this IMasterForm object belongs.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterFormsCategory
member.summary: Represents a category inside a IMasterFormsRepository that may have Master Forms and/or other sub-categories (child categories). It provides methods to add and delete Master Forms, sub-categories (child categories), and category information such as its name and its parent category.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterFormsCategory.AddChildCategory(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a new sub-category (child category) to this category in both the storage device and ChildCategories.
member.param: Name of the category.
member.returns: Returns an object of the created IMasterFormsCategory.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterFormsCategory.AddMasterForm(Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.FormRecognitionAttributes,Leadtools.Forms.Processing.FormPages,Leadtools.RasterImage)
member.summary: Adds a new Master Form to this category in both the storage device and MasterForms.
member.param: Master Form attributes.
Master Form fields.
Master Form image.
member.returns: Returns an object of the created IMasterForm.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterFormsCategory.AddMasterForm(Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.FormRecognitionAttributes,Leadtools.Forms.Processing.FormPages,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Adds a new Master Form to this category in both the storage device and MasterForms.
member.param: Master Form attributes.
Master Form fields.
A System.IO.Stream containing the name of the Master Form image data.
member.returns: Returns an object of the created IMasterForm.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterFormsCategory.AddMasterForm(Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.FormRecognitionAttributes,Leadtools.Forms.Processing.FormPages,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a new Master Form to this category in both the storage device and MasterForms.
member.param: Master Form attributes.
Master Form fields.
A System.String containing the name of the Master Form image file.
member.returns: Returns an object of the created IMasterForm.

member.summary: Adds a new Master Form to this category in both the storage device and MasterForms.
member.param: Master Form attributes.
Master Form fields.
A System.Uri containing the name of the Master Form image data.
member.returns: Returns an object of the created IMasterForm.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterFormsCategory.Clear
member.summary: Removes all Master Forms and sub-categories (child categories) from MasterForms and ChildCategories and deletes them from the storage device.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterFormsCategory.DeleteChildCategory(Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterFormsCategory)
member.summary: Removes the specified sub-category (child category) from ChildCategories and deletes it from the storage device.
member.param: The child category to be deleted.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterFormsCategory.DeleteMasterForm(Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterForm)
member.summary: Removes the specified Master Form from MasterForms and deletes it from the storage device.
member.param: The Master Form to be deleted.

member.summary: Returns the number of Master Forms in MasterForms.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterFormsRepository
member.summary: Provides the interface for the Master Form repository providing methods for collecting the Master Forms available in the storage device to be used in AutoFormsEngine.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterFormsRepository.Refresh
member.summary: Updates the repository with the latest modifications and changes that have occurred to the Master Forms in the storage site.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterFormsRepository.RasterCodecsInstance
member.summary: Gets the Leadtools.Codecs.RasterCodecs used for loading and saving images of objects that implement the IMasterFormsRepository interface.
member.value: Returns the Leadtools.Codecs.RasterCodecs used for loading and saving images of objects that implement the IMasterFormsRepository interface.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Auto.IMasterFormsRepository.RootCategory
member.summary: Gets the root category of the repository.
member.value: Returns the IMasterFormsCategory that represents the top category that has all Master Forms and sub-categories that are going to be used for AutoFormsEngine.
